name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの街

description: The canal-lined streets of Water 7 where Luffy and Franky engage in their initial confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Franky Begins
keyEvents.description: The location where Luffy and Franky's battle begins after Franky calls him out for a fight.
keyEvents.significance: The public nature of this fight in the streets draws attention and witnesses, escalating the situation.

keyEvents.title: Franky's Fresh Fire Display
keyEvents.description: Franky uses his fire-breathing ability in the streets, nearly hitting Water 7 citizens.
keyEvents.significance: The public display of Franky's cyborg abilities in the streets creates spectacle and danger for bystanders.

statusHistory.reason: Location serves as battlefield for multiple conflicts

name.japanese: ウォーターセブン造船所

description: The shipbuilding district of Water 7 where the Galley-La Company operates, which becomes a battlefield during Luffy and Franky's fight.

keyEvents.title: Destruction of the Shipyard
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Franky's battle escalates through the shipyard, causing significant property damage.
keyEvents.significance: The destruction of the shipyard adds to the charges against the Straw Hats and demonstrates the intensity of the conflict.

keyEvents.title: Galley-La Company Intervenes
keyEvents.description: The Galley-La Company members rush to the shipyard to stop Luffy and Franky from destroying it.
keyEvents.significance: The shipyard becomes the site of a multi-sided battle involving Luffy, Franky, and the Galley-La Company.

statusHistory.reason: Damaged during Luffy and Franky's battle

name.japanese: ウォーターセブン病院

description: The hospital where Iceburg is being treated after being shot by CP9 agents disguised as Robin and another attacker.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg's Testimony
keyEvents.description: Iceburg regains consciousness in the hospital and identifies Robin as one of his attackers before losing consciousness again.
keyEvents.significance: This critical moment in the hospital changes the entire course of the Water 7 Arc, turning the city against the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Hospital treating Iceburg after assassination attempt

name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの運河

description: The extensive canal system that runs throughout Water 7, serving as the city's primary transportation routes.

keyEvents.title: Franky Demonstrates Swimming Ability
keyEvents.description: Franky jumps into the canal waters and swims to prove he hasn't eaten a Devil Fruit.
keyEvents.significance: The canals provide the setting for Franky to demonstrate that his abilities come from cyborg modifications rather than Devil Fruit powers.
